items.title: Is the US really heading into a recession?
items.description: Stock market falls, tariffs and other changes are reigniting fear of economic downturn in the US.

items.title: Greenland's opposition wins election dominated by independence and Trump
items.description: The Democrats party wants a gradual move to independence but the second-placed party is keen to speed it up.

items.title: Passengers describe 'doomsday scenes' on hijacked train
items.description: More than 400 passengers were on board a train in south-west Pakistan when armed militants attacked.

items.title: Six things that could get more expensive for Americans under Trump tariffs
items.description: Economists say the president's import taxes could result in higher prices for a range of products in the US.

items.title: Somali forces end deadly 24-hour hotel siege
items.description: An explosives-laden vehicle blew up before gunmen entered the hotel, witnesses say.
